tool_description: an Api showing all the latest Turkish Market Exchange rates
title: Turkish Market Exchange Rates

api_list.name: Get Exchange Rates Using Symbols

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: You can get  currency \\\\\\\"code\\\\\\\" of all currency units from /symbol endopint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://turkish-market-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com/market/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turkish-market-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Currency Symbols and Name
api_list.description: Displays all currency symbols and names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://turkish-market-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com/symbols"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Exchange Rate
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Exchange Rate
